headline.main: CITY GOVERNMENT.; THE BOARD OF ALDERMEN. THE SALE OF MILK ON SUNDAYS--CENTRAL PARK OPERATIONS--MOUNT MORRIS-SQUARE VETOED --OWNERS OF PROPERTY LIABLE FOR REPAIRING, ETC.

docs.lead_paragraph: At the meeting of the Board of Aldermen last evening, a resolution was adopted to the effect that as the Police have notified milk-vendors to cease the sale of milk on Sundays, therefore be it resolved, that the milk-vendores be allowed to continue the sale of milk as heretofore.

headline.main: CITY INTELLIGENCE.; Steuben Monument Festival at Elm Park. SPEECHES OF MAYOR WOOD AND OTHERS--MUSIC, DANCING, FIREWORKS AND LAGER BEER.

docs.lead_paragraph: The festival in aid of the fund of the Steuben Monument Association, which occurred yesterday at Elm Park, drew together some fifteen hundred persons, a number which would have been considerably increased but for the fact that similar festivities were going on at the same time at Yorkville.

docs.lead_paragraph: It appears that the news which comes to us from California, of the assassination of the Tycoon of Japan, is received with reserve by the Naval Commissioners in charge of the Japanese Embassy, now at Philadelphia. We alluded to it yesterday in the same spirit; for, ...

docs.snippet: JERSEY CITY YACHT CLUB.--This fine Club have their yachting harbor on the bay which makes in at the southwesterly point of Jersey City. Two years ago the Club built a fine two-story Club-house, and sunk a number of canal boats to the south and west...
docs.lead_paragraph: JERSEY CITY YACHT CLUB.--This fine Club have their yachting harbor on the bay which makes in at the southwesterly point of Jersey City. Two years ago the Club built a fine two-story Club-house, and sunk a number of canal boats to the south and west of it.

docs.snippet: This will infallibly, positively, invariably cure all those torturing perplexing and debilitating symptoms commonly known as female disease, weakness, irregularities,  c., which weary and render peace pay so many women between the ages of 15 and 50,...
docs.lead_paragraph: This will infallibly, positively, invariably cure all those torturing perplexing and debilitating symptoms commonly known as female disease, weakness, irregularities, c., which weary and render peace pay so many women between the ages of 15 and 50, for which the medical profession seeks in vain for a remedy, and from which wealth, position, delicacy and replacement afford no exemption.

headline.main: BLONDIN AT NIAGARA.; He Grosses the River Twice on a Tight Rope The Scene of the Exploit The Preparations and the Achievement.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Monarch Muscle, whom British and American Warwicks have recently enthroned, held his Court to-day on the boundary-line of the two nations. Subjects from both his peoples flocked to do him homage. On a high throne, "in awful state," he stood erect, seeming to defy nature in her very lair, and nature's laws. Niagara foamed and fretted beneath ...
